entry.title: Announcing Flatterer: converting structured data into tabular data
entry.summary: In this blog post, we introduce Flatterer — a new tool that helps convert JSON into tabular data.

entry.summary: On 24 June we hosted a conversation with the Lacuna Fund about datasets for climate change...

entry.title: Workshop on FAIR and Frictionless Workflows for Tabular Data
entry.summary: On 28 and 29 April 4TU.ResearchData and the Frictionless Data team joined forces to organize an online workshop on “FAIR and frictionless workflows for tabular data”
